notes.title: Authorsâ€™ contributions
notes.p: X-HY, A-HY, and M-YL conceived the study. JX, X-HY, and M-YL designed the study. S-QH, H-YZ, H-YC, K-YC, Q-YD, and PL collected samples. S-QH, W-LZ, C-BZ, and HL collected and analysed field data. JX, X-HY, S-QH, and C-BZ performed molecular assays. JX and X-HY drafted the manuscript. All authors have read and approved the final manuscript.
